name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ogimi, Your Personalized AI Meditation Coach

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ogimi generates custom guided meditations tailored to your specific needs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Ogimi, the chrome extension for your personalized AI Meditation Coach. 

Ogimi generates custom guided meditations tailored to your specific needs, allowing you to target specific challenges in your life. A consistent guided meditation practice can help you: 

1. Improved focus and concentration
2. Reduced stress and anxiety
3. Shift your mindset to positivity and gratitude
4. Sleep Better
5. Increase self-awareness and process emotions
6. Improve relationships

Track your meditation practice and maintain your consistency with features like streaks, minutes, points, and rankings on leaderboards. 

The extension also offers a library of recorded meditations, teaching the fundamentals of meditation, and allows you to choose from various ambient tracks for a more immersive experience.

Say goodbye to generic meditations and say hello to your personalized meditation journey with Ogimi.
